name: Anti stress ball: DIY slime
description:
If you are overcome by anxiety and stress, try to relax using our game. You can choose an antistress ball, jelly ball or full screen of slime, customize it and do whatever you want! Tap, pinch and drag your finger across the screen as if it was a real antistress toy. Take a break from pressing problems to have some relaxation!

Game features:
~ A game for relaxation and stress relief
~ Elastic antistress ball: squeeze and relieve tension
~ Cool jelly ball: the only thing you can't do is to throw it against the wall :)
~ Gooey & sticky slime: use your finger as if on a liquid screen
~ All colors of the rainbow: choose to your taste
~ Many textures: both realistic and magical
~ Cool physics: the toys react just like the real toys
